title: Warhol breaks record
subtitle: Shot Sage Blue Marilyn, a portrait of Marilyn Monroe by Andy Warhol (USA), sold for $195m.
description: This iconic work is aptly named. In the fall of 1965, performance artist Dorothy Podber visited Andy Warhol’s studio and ask if she could “shoot” them, and when Warhol agreed, assumed she was going to take pictures, she pulled out a gun and shot the canvases.

title: Simone Leigh won Golden Lions
subtitle: Simone Leigh was recognized for her bronze bust Brick House at this year’s Venice Biennale.
description: The status weighs about 5,900 pounds, and it was first installed on the High Line, New York, in 2019. It is now permanently set at the gateway to College Green on the University of Pennsylvania campus.

title: Questlove at Oscars
subtitle: ‘Summer of Soul’ wins best documentary at 94th OScars.
description: Questlove won both the Oscar and Grammy for the documentary. After winning both the grand jury prize and audience award at the Sundance Film Festival, the documentary sold for more than $12 million, the biggest price tag for a documentary in the festival’s history.

title: Super Bowl LVI halftime show
subtitle: Dr. Dre, Snoop Dogg, Eminem, Mary J. Blige, and Kendrick Lamar performed at Super Bowl.
description:
It was the first Super Bowl halftime show centered entirely around Hip Hop.  All artists saw a large boost in their streaming numbers. 
Snoop Dogg’s “The Next Episode” ⬆ 270%, "Still D.R.E" ⬆ 245%
Dr. Dre’s collective Spotify streaming number ⬆ 185%
Blige’s “No More Drama” ⬆ 520%.

title: Jon Batiste wins 5 Grammys
subtitle: Jon Batiste won album of the year honors for “We Are” and 4 other awards at the Grammy Awards.
description:
Batiste has the most Grammy nominations since Michael Jackson’s Thriller, released 40 years ago.
He won Oscar for his music work on the Disney movie, Soul and he was the bandleader for Stephen Colbert’s Late shown between 2015 and 2022.

title: Beyonce's 'Renaissance'
subtitle: Released in July 2022, was an instant No.1 hit and critical darling.
description: Within three months of its release, Renaissance amassed over 1 billion streams on Spotify.

title: Taylor Swift Ticketmaster saga
subtitle: Taylor Swift’s Eras Tour sold $590M in ticket sales and brought down Ticketmaster.
description: With the 52 dates of Eras’ tour, Taylor Swift will become the highest-grossing female touring artist, a spot which has been held by Madonna. Also, after the infamous Ticketmaster outage, the Justice Department opened an antitrust investigation into the owner of Ticketmaster.

title: Major musicians sell their entire Song catalogues
subtitle: Top artists selling their back catalogue such as Bob Dylan, etc.
description: It is estimated that Bob Dylan’s entire back catalogue brings in $16 million in annual recurring revenue.

title: Paul Allen Auction
subtitle: It is the biggest sale in auction history, at $1.5 billion.
description: The sales attracted over 4 million viewers and five of the works sold exceeded $100 million. 24 works achieved artist records ranging from household names such as Vincent van Gogh and Paul Cezanne to living artists like Guillermo Kuitca and Nancy Rubens.

title: Top Gun: Maverick
subtitle: The highest-grossing domestic debut in Tom Cruise's career.
description: It cost $170 million to produce this movie and, the use of F-18s Jets cost the producers $11,000 per hour. But the movie already brought $1.5B worldwide.
